entities: Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS)
reporting_cycle: Secretary-General reports every 90 days, midterm report to the Committee by 15 October 2011, and a final report by 15 days before the end of its mandated period
summary:
Authorizes communication of information gathered by UNOCI, French Forces, and the Kimberley Process Certification Scheme to the Security Council.

 Encourages Ivorian authorities to work with the Kimberley Process Certification Scheme to review and assess internal controls on diamond trade.

 Urges cooperation from states, UN bodies, and organizations with the Committee, Group of Experts, UNOCI, and French Forces.
The Security Council:

Recalls previous resolutions on children in armed conflict and sexual violence, and welcomes information-sharing between the Committee and Special Representatives on these issues.

Urges Ivorian parties and regional States to:

- Ensure the safety of the Group of Experts
- Provide unhindered access to persons, documents, and sites for the Group to execute its mandate

Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
